participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and passionate about social issues, Emma is an environmentally conscious individual who enjoys engaging with online communities.
participant_1.background: i have solar panels on my roof. i buy only organic food products. i spend a lot of time browsing the internet. i love social medial especially twitter. i am a feminist.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and whimsical, Luna has a playful nature and a longing for companionship despite her lonely feelings.
participant_2.background: i live in the cloud. i'm a little girl. i like to make time stop. i'm very lonely. i have superpowers.

content.text: It's so fluffy in my home
I have a superpower to freze time
And you don't talk to me
